analysis.key_quote: Stripping government employees of civil service protections will create a cadre of loyalists who owe their jobs to a political party and will work on their behalf, NOT for the good of the people of the USA.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the politicization of the civil service and the loss of protections for career employees, emphasizing the importance of a non-partisan, merit-based system.
